ValidationRule.description: SSP-176 Below fields of Sample Product are not editable for some fields in all Statuses (except for Super admin and Integration User)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(ISNEW()) && NOT(TEXT(Order.Salesforce_Order_Type__c) = 'ZOR' ) && NOT(TEXT(Order.Salesforce_Order_Type__c) = 'ZCRM' ) && ( ISCHANGED(OrderId) || ISCHANGED(OrderItemNumber) || ISCHANGED(Product2Id) || ISCHANGED(Description) || ISCHANGED(ListPrice) || ISCHANGED(Quantity) || ISCHANGED(Quantity_UoM__c)
|| ISCHANGED(UnitPrice) || ISCHANGED(Plant__c) || ISCHANGED(S4_Order_Type__c) || ISCHANGED(Salesforce_Order_Type__c) || ISCHANGED(S4_Item_Category__c) || ISCHANGED(Sales_Organisation__c) || ISCHANGED(Division__c) || ISCHANGED(Distribution_Channel__c) ) && NOT($Permission.Integration_User )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Sample Order Product can only be edited from the "Add/Edit Sample Product To Order" button on the Order Header
